content: Introducing [$RWA] - Â Token that Bridges the Gap between Crypto and Real World Official Website: Assetx.Network | Twitter: AssetX_Network | Â Telegram: AssetX Network [AssetX] - Tokenized Asset ExchangeAssetX is a platform that allows users to buy, sell, and trade tokenized assets that generate high yield returns. These assets include real estate, art, NFTs, and more. AssetX aims to democratize access to alternative investments and create a more efficient and transparent market.[RWA] - The Utility Token of AssetXRWA is the native token of AssetX that powers the ecosystem and provides various benefits to the users. RWA holders can enjoy lower fees, governance rights, staking rewards, and exclusive access to premium assets on the platform. RWA has a total supply of 100 million tokens and follows the ERC-20 standard Learn more.Airdrop AnnouncementWe're thrilled to share some amazing news with you! In celebration of our incredible journey together, we're initiating a special $RWA Airdrop exclusively for our early supporters.How to Join?-Visit our website www.assetx.network and click on the airdrop button.-Fill out the form with your details and wallet address.-Join us on all social media channels (Twitter, Telegram, Facebook, etc.)-Share your ETH wallet address down below in the commentsThatâ€™s it! You have successfully entered the airdrop campaign. We will distribute the tokens after the campaign ends on September 30, 2023.
